name: github-no-symbols-panel
description: An attempt to disable the annoying symbols panel.

docs.description:
This user script disables the symbols panel by preventing the click events that fired when clicking the code in the text area.

Also, it removes the symbols panel icon.

[Related topic](https://github.com/orgs/community/discussions/54962)
docs.usage: Once installed, the script will automatically be activated.
docs.limitations: This is just a workaround and hopefully GitHub will add an option to disable this feature.
